about_the_game:
Neon District is the cyberpunk role-playing adventure and flagship franchise developed by Blockade Games. Leveraging the latest in decentralized technologies, players battle to progress through a sci-fi dystopia and earn in-game items.

Neon District: Season One features a full single-player campaign filled with crime syndicates, oracles, cogs, genetic mods, winding plots, and a morally-questionable cast of characters. Play through scores of missions and complete contracts to survive, and you'll find yourself falling deeper into the dark, seedy reality underlying the powers-that-be within Unity.
detailed_description:
Neon District is the cyberpunk role-playing adventure and flagship franchise developed by Blockade Games. Leveraging the latest in decentralized technologies, players battle to progress through a sci-fi dystopia and earn in-game items.

Neon District: Season One features a full single-player campaign filled with crime syndicates, oracles, cogs, genetic mods, winding plots, and a morally-questionable cast of characters. Play through scores of missions and complete contracts to survive, and you'll find yourself falling deeper into the dark, seedy reality underlying the powers-that-be within Unity.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.4GHz Intel Core i3-4130
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB Nvidia GTX 680 or better, 2GB AMD R9 285 (GCN 3rd Gen) or better
  • Storage: 52 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.4 GHz Intel Core i7-4770
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB Nvidia 970, 4GB AMD RX 480
  • Storage: 52 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.14
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB Nvidia 680MX, 2GB AMD R9 M290, 1.5GB Intel Iris Graphics 540 or better (see notes for more details)
  • Storage: 51 MB available space

name: Neon District: Season One

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo 3.0Ghz
  • Memory: 5 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 460 1GB | AMD Radeon HD 5770 1GB | Intel HD4000 @720p
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 (8.1)/ 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4570 3.20GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770 4GB | AMD Radeon R9 290X 4GB @1080p
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 60 MB available space

short_description: F2P Cyberpunk RPG like never before. Battle through procedural and story-driven missions to collect characters, gear, juice and parts. Adapt quickly to increasingly difficult enemies and complex puzzles, master the rich trading-card game battle mechanics, and grok tactics to survive in the District.
